func checkYear() error {
	err := errors.New("wrong year")
	a, _ := getYear()
	switch a {
	case 2020:
		fmt.Println("it is", a, err)
	case 2021:
		fmt.Println("it is", a)
		err = nil
	}
	fmt.Println("after check, it is", a)
	return err
}
